document.full_text: staff at buckingham palace have lifted the lid on preparations for prince william's wedding next month, giving an insight into what guests can expect and the amount of work needed to make it a success.
document.title: uk palace staff lift lid on wedding preparations
lines_and_colors: staff at buckingham palace have lifted the lid on preparations for prince william's wedding next month, giving an insight into what guests can expect and the amount of work needed to make it a success.
